Header: Instructors for Drug Prevention Trained at KLN
Content: Lecturers at the Directorate of Psychological Operations met 45 military Officers of the Security Forces in Jaffna and Kilinochchi at the Security Force Headquarters - Kilinochchi (SFHQ-KLN) auditorium and educated them to be training instructors for ‘Drug Prevention’ projects during 25 November - 1 December. This workshop was organized on the instructions of Major General G.V Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi considering the importance of having such instructors with the Army.
